name: rgss-script-editor
description: It allows to edit RPG Maker ruby script files extracting them from the Scripts bundled data file

rgssScriptEditor.debug.logToConsole.description: Enables this extension to log information to the Visual Studio Code debug console

rgssScriptEditor.debug.logToFile.description: Enables this extension to log information to a file

rgssScriptEditor.extension.quickStart.description: Allows the extension to activate itself by checking whether the opened folder is a valid RPG Maker project or not

rgssScriptEditor.external.backUpsFolder.description: The relative path within the project's folder where all back ups will be saved

rgssScriptEditor.external.scriptsFolder.description: The relative path within the project's folder where all scripts will be extracted

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.gameExecutable.description: The relative path to the game executable inside the project folder

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.automaticArgum.description: Allows the extension to determine the appropiate game executable arguments based on the RGSS version (When this mode is enabled custom arguments are ignored)

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.editorTestMode.description: Whether to run the game on test mode or not (This flag is ignored when using custom arguments)

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.nativeConsole.description: (RPG Maker VX Ace Only) Whether to allow a console window to appear on game execution or not (This flag is ignored when using custom arguments)

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.customArgument.description: Set your own custom arguments here separated by a whitespace (You must disable 'auto. arguments detection' behavior to use this)

viewsWelcome.contents:
There is no folder opened in Visual Studio Code.
You should open a RPG Maker project folder to start this extension.
[Open Folder](command:vscode.openFolder)

You must select a folder to set it as the active RPG Maker project.
[Set Active Project Folder](command:rgss-script-editor.setProjectFolder)

You must extract the contents of the RPG Maker bundled file.
A folder containing all script files extracted will be created in the currently selected project folder.
[Extract Scripts](command:rgss-script-editor.extractScripts)

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
